overview: To the casual observer, Missy's life seems idyllic, yet her heart cries out for more love, attention, passion, more anything, more everything. Then along comes Michael — a hired hand — with passion to spare & everything else that Missy's missing! Heartache received several AVN nominations, including Best Feature Video.
tagline: Missy, in an erotic performance you'll never forget...
title: Heartache
